title: Nesting and Labels
description: In this lab, we learn about nesting and labeling loops in Rust, where we can use the break and continue statements to terminate or skip outer loops within nested loops by annotating loops with labels.

meta.title: Nesting and Labels in Rust Programming
meta.description: Learn about nesting and labeling loops in Rust, using break and continue statements to control outer loops within nested loops.
meta.keywords: nesting, rust playground, labels, rust tutor, loops, rust online compiler, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online

i18n.title: 嵌套与标签
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们学习Rust中循环的嵌套和标记，通过给循环添加标签，我们可以使用break和continue语句来终止或跳过嵌套循环中的外层循环。

meta.title: Rust编程中的嵌套与标签
meta.description: 了解Rust中循环的嵌套和标记，使用break和continue语句控制嵌套循环中的外层循环。
